title: Windows 7 and Windows 8 Codecs (2013-08-03)
description:
Windows Codecs for Windows 7 and Windows 8 Systems
This allows Windows Media Player to play most common formats, so you can watch all your torrent downloaded movies and series including soft subbed MKV files with multiple audio (e.g. different languages) and subtitle tracks.

---

Well, after a long time a new release. Sorry, no more legal-tracker.de so you just have to search here for new updates.

As always, this is the official shark007 codecs, bundled both 32- and 64-bit. But now this has been renamed to Advanced codecs instead of Windows 7 codecs, since Windows 8 is supported as well. I decided to mention it another way in the torrent title.

Be aware that shark007 codecs now inclode even more adware, so be careful to skip the installation of the adware and to only install the codecs. I decided not to change the original files.
